name: ChromaCloak
description:
Chromacloak is a fast paced infiltration puzzle game with a unique light detection system. The objective of the game is to complete all the levels and fully infiltrate EvilCorp Inc.. Using quick thinking and multiple colours, our hero can navigate through each level using her Chromacloak. The Chromacloak's technology allows our hero to hide in plain sight of the sentries who can only detect certain wavelengths.

Controls:

[WASD]/[ArrowKeys] - Movement

[B] -> Red

[N] -> Blue

[M] -> Yellow

Free assets used:

- Sound file: http://opengameart.org/content/spy-16bit-8bit-chiptune-retro-style-song-for-your-games
